banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: "San Francisco"

nodes.whoTheyAre: Francisco Fernandez has been the bucking force behind his unstoppable outlaw cowboy band for the last ten years. The Ferocious Few's punkabilly roadhouse rock & roll has commanded attention everywhere they play, charging upwards from the streets of San Francisco to headlining SF's The Great American Music Hall and opening for Cyndi Lauper on her Memphis Blues tour as well as festivals such as Coachella and Lightning in a Bottle.

videoData.description: A musical duo from the streets of San Francisco bring a healthy dose of rock-n-roll grit to the TED@IBM stage. With a stripped-down performance of "San Francisco", they aim to encourage musicians and fans to question boundaries and push limits.
videoData.socialDescription: A musical duo from the streets of San Francisco bring a healthy dose of rock-n-roll grit to the TED@IBM stage. With a stripped-down performance of "San Francisco", they aim to encourage musicians and fans to question boundaries and push limits.
